datasets.name: demo
datasets.description: A small demonstration graph with 5 nodes and 6 edges. Perfect for understanding PageRank algorithm basics.

datasets.name: dblp
datasets.description: Collaboration network from the DBLP computer science bibliography. Nodes represent authors, edges represent co-authorship relationships.

datasets.name: email-enron
datasets.description: Email communication network from the Enron Corporation. Nodes represent email addresses, directed edges represent email exchanges.

datasets.name: astro
datasets.description: Citation network from the arXiv Astrophysics category. Nodes represent scientific papers, edges represent citations between papers.

datasets.name: dblp-full
datasets.description: Full DBLP collaboration network. Large dataset with over 300,000 nodes. Recommended to use WASM algorithms only.
